MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  EH9 & EH10  postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Greenhill Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:04am. Our engineers are on their way to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible 10:15am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:19am on the 24th of April 2021
